doc:
Helen Burgess https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Helen_Burgess 0 Helen Margarite Burgess (April 26, 1916 – April 7, 1937) was an American film and stage actress. Discovered by Cecil B. DeMille, she began her acting career in 1936 at age nineteen, playing Louisa Cody in DeMille's Western biopic The Plainsman. She would appear in four films as a contract player for Paramount Pictures before dying at age twenty from pneumonia. Helen_Margarite_Burgess ( April_26_,_1916 – April_7_,_1937 ) was an_American_film_and_stage_actress . Discovered by Cecil_B._DeMille , she began her acting career in 1936 at age_nineteen , playing Louisa_Cody in DeMille 's_Western_biopic The_Plainsman . She would_appear in four_films as a_contract_player for Paramount_Pictures before dying at age_twenty from pneumonia .
